name: Basket Box
description:
Basket Box is a 3D Basketball game with Low Poly Graphics and you can play against some bot and get the best high score.

Features:

  • Many characters to choose
  • Random level generator
  • You can throw the Basketball more easily to save your life

Platform:

  • Windows PC
  • WebGL coming soon...

Pro Tips:

1. You can't grab bot's ball, because you have your own ball.

2. Hold the right mouse button to grab the ball and then press left mouse button to throw the ball.

Music & Sound Provided by:

  • Sound Image - https://soundimage.org/
